description:
Development Environment, Tooling Platform and Application Framework.

Apache NetBeans is much more than a text editor. It highlights source code syntactically and semantically, lets you easily refactor code, with a range of handy and powerful tools.
This is the first complete release by Friends of Apache NetBeans.
This release set includes all requested installers for linux, Microsoft Windows, and Apple Macos.
All installers include a arch/os specific version of Azul zulu jdk 25.0.2.
